entities.name: trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is a Hogwarts professor who has been there for 16 years. She is known for her terrifying visions and is described as having enormous lenses on her glasses.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is the one who is sacking Professor Trelawney. She is described as having a toadlike face and sounding callously amused.

relationships.description: Professor Umbridge sacks Professor Trelawney due to her poor performance during inspections.
